verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called מֹשֶׁה֮ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> all Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> unto them Hear יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> O Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> the statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> and judgments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I דֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> which I speak בְּאָזְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H241><s%> in your ears הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day וּלְמַדְתֶּ֣ם <S%H3925><s%> that ye may learn אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8104><s%> them and keep לַעֲשֹׂתָֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> and do
יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God כָּרַ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> made עִמָּ֛נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant בְּחֹרֵֽב׃ <S%H2722><s%> with us in Horeb

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> with our fathers כָּרַ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> made יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> not this covenant הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִתָּ֗נוּ <S%H854><s%> with אֲנַ֨חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> but with us אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> [even] us who [are] all of us פֹ֛ה <S%H6311><s%> here הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day כֻּלָּ֥נוּ <S%H3605><s%> us all חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> here alive

פָּנִ֣ים ׀ <S%H6440><s%> with you face בְּפָנִ֗ים <S%H6440><s%> to face דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> talked יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עִמָּכֶ֛ם <S%H5973><s%> at בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of the fire

אָ֠נֹכִי <S%H595><s%> I עֹמֵ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> (I stood בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> between יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> between the LORD וּבֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H996><s%> between בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and you at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> to shew לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> you the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יְרֵאתֶם֙ <S%H3372><s%> for ye were afraid מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> by reason הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> of the fire וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not עֲלִיתֶ֥ם <S%H5927><s%> and went not up בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> the mountain לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> said ס

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצֵאתִ֛יךָ <S%H3318><s%> which brought thee out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבֵּ֣י֥ת <S%H1004><s%> from the house עֲבָדִֽ֑ים׃ <S%H5650><s%> of bondage
לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יִהְיֶ֥ה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall have לְךָ֛֩ אֱלֹהִ֥֨ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֖֜ים <S%H312><s%> Thou shalt have none other עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פָּנָֽ֗יַ׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

לֹֽ֣א־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה־ <S%H6213><s%> Thou shalt not make לְךָ֥֣ פֶ֣֙סֶל֙ ׀ <S%H6459><s%> thee [any] graven image כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any תְּמוּנָ֔֡ה <S%H8544><s%> [or] any likeness אֲשֶׁ֤֣ר <S%H834><s%> what בַּשָּׁמַ֣֙יִם֙ ׀ <S%H8064><s%> [of any thing] that [is] in heaven מִמַּ֔֡עַל <S%H4605><s%> above וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר֩ <S%H834><s%> what בָּאָ֖֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> or that [is] in the earth מִתָּ֑֜חַת <S%H8478><s%> under וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what בַּמַּ֖֣יִם ׀ <S%H4325><s%> beneath or that [is] in the waters מִתַּ֥֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under לָאָֽ֗רֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> beneath the earth

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥֣ה <S%H7812><s%> Thou shalt not bow down לָהֶ֖ם֮ וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or תָעָבְדֵ֑ם֒ <S%H5647><s%> thyself unto them nor serve כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> them for I the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God קַנָּ֔א <S%H7067><s%> [am] a jealous פֹּ֠קֵד <S%H6485><s%> visiting עֲוֹ֨ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity אָב֧וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בָּנִ֛ים <S%H1121><s%> upon the children וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on שִׁלֵּשִׁ֥ים <S%H8029><s%> unto the third וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רִבֵּעִ֖ים <S%H7256><s%> and fourth לְשֹׂנְאָֽ֑י׃ <S%H8130><s%> [generation] of them that hate

וְעֹ֤֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> And shewing חֶ֖֙סֶד֙ <S%H2617><s%> mercy לַֽאֲלָפִ֑֔ים <S%H505><s%> unto thousands לְאֹהֲבַ֖י <S%H157><s%> of them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> me and keep [מִצְוֹתֹו כ] (מִצְוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H4687><s%> commanded ק) ס

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשָּׂ֛א <S%H5375><s%> Thou shalt not take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לַשָּׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> in vain כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not יְנַקֶּה֙ <S%H5352><s%> will not hold [him] guiltless יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> that taketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name לַשָּֽׁוְא׃ <S%H7723><s%> in vain ס

שָׁמ֣֛וֹר <S%H8104><s%> Keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֥וֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֖֨ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath לְקַדְּשׁ֑֜וֹ <S%H6942><s%> to sanctify כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוְּךָ֖֣ ׀ <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֥֣ה <S%H3068><s%> it as the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God

שֵׁ֤֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> Six יָמִ֣ים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days תַּֽעֲבֹ֔ד֮ <S%H5647><s%> thou shalt labour וְעָשִׂ֖֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and do כָּֿל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלַאכְתֶּֽךָ֒׃ <S%H4399><s%> all thy work

וְי֙וֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜֔י <S%H7637><s%> But the seventh שַׁבָּ֖֣ת ׀ <S%H7676><s%> [is] the sabbath לַיהוָ֖֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> [in it] thou shalt not do כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלָאכָ֡ה <S%H4399><s%> any work אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבִנְךָֽ־ <S%H1121><s%> thou nor thy son וּבִתֶּ֣ךָ <S%H1323><s%> nor thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָֽ־ <S%H5650><s%> nor thy manservant וַ֠אֲמָתֶךָ <S%H519><s%> nor thy maidservant וְשׁוֹרְךָ֨ <S%H7794><s%> nor thine ox וַחֲמֹֽרְךָ֜ <S%H2543><s%> nor thine ass וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any בְּהֶמְתֶּ֗ךָ <S%H929><s%> nor any of thy cattle וְגֵֽרְךָ֙ <S%H1616><s%> nor thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> that [is] within thy gates לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יָנ֛וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> may rest עַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> that thy manservant וַאֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H519><s%> and thy maidservant כָּמֽ֑וֹךָ׃ <S%H3644><s%> You

וְזָכַרְתָּ֞֗ <S%H2142><s%> And remember כִּ֣י־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֶ֤֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> that thou wast a servant הָיִ֣֙יתָ֙ ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיֹּצִ֨אֲךָ֜֩ <S%H3318><s%> brought יְהוָ֤֨ה <S%H3068><s%> and [that] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֤֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God מִשָּׁ֔ם֙ <S%H8033><s%> of there בְּיָ֤֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָ֖ה֙ <S%H2389><s%> thee out thence through a mighty וּבִזְרֹ֣עַ <S%H2220><s%> arm נְטוּיָ֑֔ה <S%H5186><s%> and by a stretched out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that צִוְּךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> thee to keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath ס

כַּבֵּ֤ד <S%H3513><s%> Honour אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> thy father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H517><s%> and thy mother כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְמַ֣עַן ׀ <S%H4616><s%> because of יַאֲרִיכֻ֣ן <S%H748><s%> may be prolonged יָמֶ֗יךָ <S%H3117><s%> thee that thy days וּלְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> and that it יִ֣יטַב <S%H3190><s%> and that it may go well לָ֔ךְ עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> with הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> with thee in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָֽךְ׃ ס
לֹ֥֖א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִּֿרְצָֽח׃ <S%H7523><s%> Thou shalt not kill ס
וְלֹ֖֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִּֿנְאָֽ֑ף׃ <S%H5003><s%> Neither shalt thou commit adultery ס
וְלֹ֖֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִּֿגְנֹֽ֔ב׃ <S%H1589><s%> Neither shalt thou steal ס
וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲנֶ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> Neither shalt thou bear בְרֵֽעֲךָ֖ <S%H7453><s%> against thy neighbour עֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> witness שָֽׁוְא׃ <S%H7723><s%> false. ס

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַחְמֹ֖ד <S%H2530><s%> Neither shalt thou desire אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> thy neighbour's ס וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִתְאַוֶּ֜ה <S%H183><s%> neither shalt thou covet בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house רֵעֶ֗ךָ <S%H7453><s%> thy neighbour's שָׂדֵ֜הוּ <S%H7704><s%> his field וְעַבְדּ֤וֹ <S%H5650><s%> or his manservant וַאֲמָתוֹ֙ <S%H519><s%> or his maidservant שׁוֹר֣וֹ <S%H7794><s%> his ox וַחֲמֹר֔וֹ <S%H2543><s%> or his ass וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> your לְרֵעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7453><s%> or any [thing] that [is] thy neighbour's ס

אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> These words הָאֵ֡לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These דִּבֶּר֩ <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קְהַלְכֶ֜ם <S%H6951><s%> unto all your assembly בָּהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount מִתּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> of the fire הֶֽעָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud וְהָֽעֲרָפֶ֔ל <S%H6205><s%> and of the thick darkness ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a great וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יָסָ֑ף <S%H3254><s%> and he added no more וַֽיִּכְתְּבֵ֗ם <S%H3789><s%> And he wrote עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> them in two לֻחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> tables אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> of stone וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and delivered אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּשָׁמְעֲכֶ֤ם <S%H8085><s%> And it came to pass when ye heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקּוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> the voice מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הַחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> of the darkness וְהָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> (for the mountain בֹּעֵ֣ר <S%H1197><s%> did burn בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וַתִּקְרְב֣וּן <S%H7126><s%> came אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> unto me [even] all the heads שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H7626><s%> of your tribes וְזִקְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H2205><s%> and your elders

וַתֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And ye said הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold הֶרְאָ֜נוּ <S%H7200><s%> hath shewed יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Behold the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> our God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּבֹד֣וֹ <S%H3519><s%> us his glory וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גָּדְל֔וֹ <S%H1433><s%> and his greatness וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹל֥וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> and we have heard מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הָאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> of the fire הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> we רָאִ֔ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> we have seen כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> doth talk אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> that God אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> with man וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2425><s%> and he liveth

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why נָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> Now therefore why should we die כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for תֹֽאכְלֵ֔נוּ <S%H398><s%> will consume הָאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire הַגְּדֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> ? for this great הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> us אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יֹסְפִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3254><s%> any more אֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we לִ֠שְׁמֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> us if we hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> any וָמָֽתְנוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> then we shall die

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂ֡ר <S%H1320><s%> For who [is there of] all flesh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> that hath heard קוֹל֩ <S%H6963><s%> the voice אֱלֹהִ֨ים <S%H430><s%> God חַיִּ֜ים <S%H2416><s%> of the living מְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> speaking מִתּוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הָאֵ֛שׁ <S%H784><s%> of the fire כָּמֹ֖נוּ <S%H3644><s%> as וַיֶּֽחִי׃ <S%H2421><s%> as we [have] and lived

קְרַ֤ב <S%H7126><s%> Go thou near אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וּֽשֲׁמָ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after יֹאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> shall say יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְאַ֣תְּ ׀ <S%H859><s%> you תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and speak אֵלֵ֗ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יְדַבֵּ֜ר <S%H1696><s%> shall speak יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> thou unto us all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וְשָׁמַ֥עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> unto thee and we will hear וְעָשִֽׂינוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> [it] and do

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice דִּבְרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1697><s%> of your words בְּדַבֶּרְכֶ֖ם <S%H1696><s%> when ye spake אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> unto me and the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me שָׁ֠מַעְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> unto me I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice דִּבְרֵ֜י <S%H1697><s%> of the words הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> of this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> of this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> which they have spoken אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you הֵיטִ֖יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> unto thee they have well כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> said all that they have spoken

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> an יִתֵּ֡ן <S%H5414><s%> in them וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> had לְבָבָ֨ם <S%H3824><s%> heart זֶ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> O that there were such לָהֶ֗ם לְיִרְאָ֥ה <S%H3372><s%> that they would fear אֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> וְלִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> me and keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתַ֖י <S%H4687><s%> all my commandments כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> always לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> that it יִיטַ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> that it might be well לָהֶ֛ם וְלִבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> with them and with their children לְעֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever
לֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> say לָהֶ֑ם שׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> again לָכֶ֖ם לְאָהֳלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H168><s%> you into your tents

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you פֹּה֮ <S%H6311><s%> here עֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> But as for thee stand עִמָּדִי֒ <S%H5978><s%> thou here by me וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה <S%H1696><s%> and I will speak אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּצְוָ֛ה <S%H4687><s%> unto thee all the commandments וְהַחֻקִּ֥ים <S%H2706><s%> and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <S%H4941><s%> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תְּלַמְּדֵ֑ם <S%H3925><s%> which thou shalt teach וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> them that they may do בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [them] in the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which I give לָהֶ֖ם לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> them to possess

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8104><s%> Ye shall observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֛ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָסֻ֖רוּ <S%H5493><s%> you ye shall not turn aside יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאל׃ <S%H8040><s%> or to the left

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in all the ways אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֜ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> shall walk לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּֽחְיוּן֙ <S%H2421><s%> you that ye may live וְט֣וֹב <S%H2895><s%> and [that it may be] well לָכֶ֔ם וְהַאֲרַכְתֶּ֣ם <S%H748><s%> with you and [that] ye may prolong יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> [your] days בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּֽירָשֽׁוּן׃ <S%H3423><s%> which ye shall possess
